Layer.Name: water[1]
Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:customtexturerect(.5,.5,2.5,2.5) self:texcoordvelocity(.6,0) self:zoomy(2) self:zoomx(3.5) self:y(200) self:croptop(.2) self:cropbottom(.2) --self:rainbow() end

Layer.Name: water[2]
Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self) self:customtexturerect(.5,.5,2.5,2.5) self:texcoordvelocity(-.6,0) self:zoomy(2) self:zoomx(3.5) self:y(100) self:croptop(.2) self:cropbottom(.2)
end

Layer.Name: water[3]
Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self) self:customtexturerect(.5,.5,2.5,2.5) self:texcoordvelocity(.3,0) self:zoomy(2) self:zoomx(4) self:y(0) self:croptop(.2) self:cropbottom(.2)
end

Layer.Name: water[4]
Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self) self:customtexturerect(.5,.5,2.5,2.5) self:texcoordvelocity(-.4,0) self:zoomy(3) self:zoomx(7) self:y(-50-100) self:croptop(.2) self:cropbottom(.2)
end

Layer.Name: water[5]
Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self) self:customtexturerect(.5,.5,2.5,2.5) self:texcoordvelocity(.4,0) self:zoomy(2) self:zoomx(4) self:cropbottom(.2) self:croptop(.2) self:y(-100-100)
end

Layer.Name: water[6]
Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self) self:customtexturerect(.5,.5,2.5,2.5) self:texcoordvelocity(-.5,0) self:zoomy(3) self:zoomx(4) self:y(-200-100) self:croptop(.2) self:cropbottom(.2)
end
